TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EdgeMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 确定非文本绘图基元的边缘的呈现方式。

span.span: Determines how the edges of non-text drawing primitives are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本对象通过抗锯齿效果，始终显示，并且不受设置的边缘模式值。Text objects are always displayed by using anti aliasing, and are not affected by setting the edge mode value. 默认值为非文本绘图基元，例如和，是未指定。The default value for non-text drawing primitives, such as and , is Unspecified. 当你设置的视觉对象的边缘模式值时，将该视觉对象的所有子绘图基元都设置为相同值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the child drawing primitives of that visual object are set to the same value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以设置到带锯齿的绘图基元的边缘模式。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a drawing primitive to Aliased. [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode Aliased = int32(1)

summary.span: 将非文本绘图基元的边缘呈现为锯齿边缘。

span.span: Render the edges of non-text drawing primitives as aliased edges.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.EdgeMode Unspecified = int32(0)

summary.span: 请勿更改当前的非文本绘图基元的边缘模式。

span.span: Do not alter the current edge mode of non-text drawing primitives.
